Tutorial.clickontheplusandfillthedifferentareas: You have to click on the plus and fill the different areas
Tutorial.Youcanmanagetheexistingscenesbyclickingo: You can manage the existing scenes by clicking on the button at the top "Manage Scenes"
Tutorial.OnasceneyoucanaddHotspotsallowyoutoplaym: On a scene you can add Hotspots allow you to play music, click on the button at the top "Manage Hotspots" add Hotspot, draw an area on the image and fill the different areas.
Tutorial.Whenyouwillclickonthehotspotyouwillheart: When you will click on the hotspot you will hear the song recorded or imported
